definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: He never did nice deeds or helped living creatures. He didn't look like a monk, either.
sentences.chinese: 他的行止根本不像個和尚，從不做好事或者救助生命。

sentences.english: You must not make rules for how everyone SHOULD behave.
sentences.chinese: 你不能指定規範讓每個人該如何行止。

sentences.english: Savages we call them because their manners differ from ours.
sentences.chinese: 我們稱爲野蠻人的人，只是習俗行止與我們不同。

definition: that being the case/then/in that case
different/unique/special/very/(classical) to behead/to die/to cut off/to separate/to surpass
prudent/cautious/to be in charge of ritual ceremonies/to hold an important office
numerous/common people (or populace)/born of a concubine
to advance or retreat/knowing when to come and when to leave/a sense of propriety
a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people/two-character surname Murong
